attributes.action: Enforce the No Smoking ban in all government buildings and offices 3mths early
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I worked for a county council, it had a no smoking policy except when "the councillors" where concerned.  Sat in their leather upholstered offices chuffing on cigars/cigarettes etc.  This is probably the case in the house of commons.   LEAD BY EXAMPLE!
